description.narrative: Institutional and local actors have enhanced capacity to target, plan, and use data in monitoring and evaluation of policies, programmes and resources for the Sustainable Development Goals UNDAF/Produit 7.2 : D'ici 2023, les institutions centrales et locales, les structures nationales de statistique et d'Ã©valuation disposent de compÃ©tences amÃ©liorÃ©es pour assurer une meilleure disponibilitÃ© et utilisation des donnÃ©es de qualitÃ© dÃ©sagrÃ©gÃ©es, la planification, le suivi et l'Ã©valuation des politiques et programmes publics., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Social And Behaviour Change, Evaluation, Immunization Services As Part Of Primary Health Care, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Reducing Child Poverty, Reducing Child Poverty (Covid), Research, Research (Covid), Strengthening Primary Health Care And High-Impact Health Interventions. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Risk-Informed Humanitarian And Development Nexus Programming, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The most vulnerable families, children and adolescents (boys and girls) benefit from a gradual increase in social protection coverage, equity of access to basic social services in their communities and opportunities for empowerment and development

title.narrative: Institutional and local actors have enhanced capacity to target, plan, and use data in monitoring and evaluation of policies,programmes and resources for the Sustainable Development Goals UNDAF/Produit 7.2 : D?ici 2023, les institutions centrales etlocales, les structures nationales de statistique et d?evaluation disposent de competences ameliorees pour assurer une meilleuredisponibilite et utilisation des donnees de qualite desagregees, la planification, le suivi et l?evaluation des politiques etprogrammes publics.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the government in implementing a survey on the continuity of basic social services one year following the onset of Covid-19 in Senegal to determine the impact of the disease on the living conditions of households and children. The assessment of UNICEF&39;s response to COVID was conducted and provided valuable lessons and recommendations for a more effective response to the pandemic by UNICEF and its partners. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/02/2022
